title: Verify Games Page
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the App from ROKU Channel store. https://channelstore.roku.com/browse
2. User should Login with the valid account
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App 
2. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Games option
3. Verify the Games page
custom_expected:
User should see the landing page with MLB logo in the upper left side.

User should see "Today's Games" on the left side(Only when the Live game is present) or user should see the current date(or game start date) and  right or left arrow button,Calendar buttons.

The main screen area should be filled with current fixtures / games along with the respective scores for that selected day.

The scores for these fixtures will be shown or hidden based on the option selected in the Settings for "Hide Scores".

title: Validate if the Cursor highlight should start in Top of the Game List
custom_preconds:
1. User should download the App from ROKU Channel store. https://channelstore.roku.com/browse
2. User should Login with the valid account
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App 
2. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Scores option
3. Verify the Games page.

WHEN the user lands on Scores page.
custom_expected:
THEN the focus highlight defaults to the upper left (first) game.

If the user land on a date without games the cursor should land on left arrow

If the user is on the first day of the season and the user cannot click left, cursor defaults to the right arrow,

If there are games on the date, the cursor should default to the top left game. (first game in list)

title: Scoreboard: Scrolling Vertically

2. User should Login with the valid account
custom_steps:

WHEN the user scrolls up and down.
custom_expected:
THEN user should see the below feature

|| WHEN the user selects Down arrow on the remote|THEN user should jump down to the next row of game tiles in the current position on the row  
|| WHEN the user selects UP arrow on the remote | THEN user should jump up to the next row of game tiles in the current position on the row.    
|| WHEN the user scroll down the page | THEN the user cannot view the Nav/Header   
|| WHEN the user press the * on the remote | THEN the should jump up to the header with the cursor on the menu item of the current page the user is on.

title: Verify Hide Spoilers ON ->Game Tile
custom_preconds:

2. User should Login with a valid account (Annual / Monthly)
3. Ensure the Hides Scores is 'ON'
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App 
2. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Games
3. User navigates to Games page

When the user selects Game Tile
custom_expected:
THEN for a scheduled game, when hide spoilers are on, I should only see the two teams and the game start time.

THEN for a live game, when hide spoilers are on, I can see the two teams and text indicating the game is live.

THEN for a live blacked out game, when hide spoilers are on I can see the blackout market flag, the live audio pill, the two teams and the live text

THEN for a final game, when hide spoilers are on, I should see the two teams, and Final Text.

THEN the Scores should be hidden.

title: Authenticated -> Settings -> Hide Spoilers
custom_preconds:

2. Select Log In on the Top Nav

custom_expected:
On the left side, user should see the text "Scores can be hidden for live and archived games to avoid display of spoilers."

title: Authenticated ->Settings-> Following Teams

title: Clips - Scrolling Vertically

custom_expected:
